com.cmput301.recipebot.model

Class RecipeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.recipebot.model.RecipeModel

  • public class RecipeModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class communicates with the DatabaseHelper and ESClient asynchronously to post updates to it's receivers UI -> Model -> Database/ESClient

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  RecipeModel.DeleteRecipeTask
      A task that deletes a recipe from the database.
      private class  RecipeModel.InsertRecipeTask
      A task that inserts a recipe into the database and on the network.
      private class  RecipeModel.LoadRecipesTask
      A concrete implementation of the RecipeModel.UpdateRecipeViewTask
      private class  RecipeModel.NetworkDeleteRecipeTask
      A task that deletes a recipe from the network.
      static interface  RecipeModel.RecipeView
      An interface that the views must implement to register for updates.
      private class  RecipeModel.UpdateRecipeTask
      A task that updates a recipe into the database and on the network.
      private class  RecipeModel.UpdateRecipeViewTask<T>
      An abstract class that updates mRecipes notifies it's views when that model is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RecipeModel getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Get the instance. Attaches to application context regardless of context. If the instacne does not exist, a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to open the database.
        Returns:
        A static instance of the model

      • addView

        public void addView(RecipeModel.RecipeView view)
        Add a view to the Model. This kicks of an AsyncTask to fetch the latest data.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to add.
        See Also:
        loadRecipes()

      • deleteView

        public void deleteView(RecipeModel.RecipeView view)
        Unregister a view from updates to the model.
        Parameters:
        view - View to ungregister.

      • notifyViews

        public void notifyViews()
        Notify all the views about a change in the model.

      • loadRecipes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> loadRecipes()
        Load all recipes in the database. It returns a cached version of the last known data, and kicks of an AsyncTask to fetch the latest data.
        Returns:
        Cached copy of the data.

      • insertRecipe

        public void insertRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        Insert a recipe to the database and server.
        Parameters:
        recipe - Recipe to insert.

        Parameters:

        Delete a recipe from the network.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the network to delete the recipe.

      • updateRecipe

        Parameters:
        recipe - Recipe to update
